reviews.text: Hubby and I were looking for a quick breakfast after 1 pm and this hit the spot! Service was quick and the food was delicious!!! My husband was craving pancakes and these were 10 out 10!

The food is honestly mid, I shop there a lot because it‚Äôs close to my job. But, I find them not seasoning my food. I asked for seasoning once and they felt so disrespected. The food is usually dry and flavor less. The coffee is great. When I ask for 4 sugars they make sure to add it. The service is great. The area is predominantly Hispanic.  At first they were racist, but since I became a regular they are very nice to me. There‚Äôs always somewhere to sit even during their busiest days.
